18 BE IT ENACTED BY THE GENERAL ASSEMBLY OF GEORGIA:
19 SECTION 1.
20 Chapter 2A of Title 31 of the Official Code of Georgia Annotated, relating to the department
21 of public health, is amended by revising subsection (d) of Code Section 31-2A-16, relating
22 to Maternal Mortality Review Committee established, as follows:
23 "(d)(1) Health care providers licensed pursuant to Title 43, health care facilities licensed
24 pursuant to Chapter 7 of Title 31, and pharmacies licensed pursuant to Chapter 4 of Title
25 26 shall provide reasonable access to the committee to all relevant medical records
26 associated with a case under review by the committee within 30 days of receiving a
27 request for such records, unless prohibited by state or federal law.
28 (2) A health care provider, health care facility, or pharmacy providing access to medical
29 and psychiatric records pursuant to this Code section shall not be held liable for civil
30 damages or be subject to any criminal or disciplinary action for good faith efforts in
31 providing such records."
